revision.text:
'''TITLEPIC''' is an image lump used in all [[ZDoom]] games as the title screen. It can only be seen when the player is not currently in a level and hasn't started the game from a warp. However, if [[CONBACK]] is not specified the TITLEPIC lump will be used as the [[Console]]'s background. TITLEPIC larger/smaller than the user's screen resolution will be scaled up or down accordingly.
The name of the lump can be changed with the {{c|TitlePage}} property in [[MAPINFO/GameInfo definition|a GameInfo section]]. In Heretic and Hexen, the lump is named TITLE by default. [[category:Graphics lumps]]
